name: Joint Nature Conservation Committee
goal: JNCC IS A STATUTORY ADVISER TO THE UK GOVERNMENT ON THE DEVELOPMENT OF POLICIES FOR, OR AFFECTING, NATURE CONSERVATION AND NATURAL HERITAGE IN THE UK AND INTERNATIONALLY
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, General and Institutional Affairs, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: MSFD, Habitats Directive, Birds Directive, EU Biodiversity Strategy, 7EAP, LIFE programme,  BISE, WISE, NNL, MAES, Green Infrastructure, CAP, CFP and other initatives that impact nature and biodiversity, CITES
